sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { CloseIcon, AddIcon, UploadIcon } from '../../utils/icons'; const MediaPressKitScreen = ({ artist, onClose }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('photos'); // Sample media data const mediaData = { photos: [ { id: 1, url: 'https://picsum.photos/400/600?random=1', title: 'Womb Tokyo Performance', date: '2024-11-30', type: 'live', size: '2.4 MB' }, { id: 2, url: 'https://picsum.photos/400/600?random=2', title: 'Studio Portrait', date: '2024-10-15', type: 'portrait', size: '1.8 MB' }, { id: 3, url: 'https://picsum.photos/400/600?random=3', title: 'Berghain Backstage', date: '2024-09-22', type: 'backstage', size: '3.1 MB' }, { id: 4, url: 'https://picsum.photos/400/600?random=4', title: 'Press Event', date: '2024-08-18', type: 'press', size: '2.7 MB' } ], audio: [ { id: 1, title: 'Underground Dreams (Original Mix)', duration: '6:42', size: '9.2 MB', type: 'track', plays: 45000 }, { id: 2, title: 'Live at Womb Tokyo 2024', duration: '45:30', size: '62.4 MB', type: 'liveset', plays: 12000 }, { id: 3, title: 'Tokyo Nights EP Preview', duration: '12:15', size: '16.8 MB', type: 'preview', plays: 8500 } ], videos: [ { id: 1, title: 'Womb Tokyo Live Performance', duration: '4:32', size: '124 MB', type: 'performance', views: 25000 }, { id: 2, title: 'Artist Interview - Electronic Pulse', duration: '8:45', size: '89 MB', type: 'interview', views: 8900 }, { id: 3, title: 'Behind the Scenes - Studio', duration: '3:21', size: '67 MB', type: 'bts', views: 15600 } ], documents: [ { id: 1, title: 'Artist Biography 2025', type: 'PDF', size: '245 KB', updated: '2024-12-01' }, { id: 2, title: 'Technical Rider', type: 'PDF', size: '512 KB', updated: '2024-11-15' }, { id: 3, title: 'Press Release - New EP', type: 'DOCX', size: '89 KB', updated: '2024-10-28' }, { id: 4, title: 'Logo & Brand Assets', type: 'ZIP', size: '15.2 MB', updated: '2024-09-10' } ] }; const formatFileSize = (bytes) => { if (bytes === 0) return '0 Bytes'; const k = 1024; const sizes = ['Bytes', 'KB', 'MB', 'GB']; const i = Math.floor(Math.log(bytes) / Math.log(k)); return parseFloat((bytes / Math.pow(k, i)).toFixed(1)) + ' ' + sizes[i]; }; return (

{artist?.name} - Media Kit

{/* Tab Navigation */}
{/* Photos Tab */} {activeTab === 'photos' && (

Photo Gallery

{mediaData.photos.map(photo => (

{photo.title}

{photo.type} • {photo.size}

))}
)} {/* Audio Tab */} {activeTab === 'audio' && (

Audio Files

{mediaData.audio.map(audio => (
🎵

{audio.title}

{audio.duration} • {audio.size} • {audio.plays.toLocaleString()} plays

))}
)} {/* Videos Tab */} {activeTab === 'videos' && (

Video Content

{mediaData.videos.map(video => (
🎥

{video.title}

{video.duration} • {video.size} • {video.views.toLocaleString()} views

))}
)} {/* Documents Tab */} {activeTab === 'documents' && (

Documents & Assets

{mediaData.documents.map(doc => (
📄

{doc.title}

{doc.type} • {doc.size} • Updated {new Date(doc.updated).toLocaleDateString()}

))}
)} {/* Press Kit Actions */}
); }; export default MediaPressKitScreen;
